messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDepartment } from '../hooks/useDepartment'; import { Badge } from '../../../shared/components/ui/Badge'; import { Card, StatCard } from '../../../shared/components/ui/Card'; import { Button } from '../../../shared/components/ui/Button'; import { DataTable, type Column } from '../../../shared/components/ui/DataTable'; import { Spinner } from '../../../shared/components/ui/Spinner'; // Removed unused Employee import export default function DepartmentDetailPage() { const { id } = useParams<{ id: string }>(); const { data: department, isLoading } = useDepartment(id || ''); if (isLoading) return
; if (!department) return
Department Node Not Found
; const employeeColumns: Column[] = [ { header: 'Consultant', accessor: (emp) => (
{emp.profilePicture ? ( ) : (
{emp.firstName[0]}{emp.lastName[0]}
)}
{emp.firstName} {emp.lastName}
{emp.employeeCode}
) }, { header: 'Designation', accessor: (emp) => {emp.designation} }, { header: 'Status', accessor: (emp) => ( {emp.employmentStatus || emp.status} ) }, { header: 'Action', accessor: (emp) => ( Profile → ) } ]; return (
{/* Header */}
Departmental Entity

{department.name}

{department.description || 'Organizational structure unit telemetry'}

{/* Stats Grid */}
} /> e.employmentStatus === 'active').length || 0) / (department.employees?.length || 1)) * 100)}%`} trend={{ value: 2, isPositive: true }} icon={ } /> } /> } />
{/* Leadership Card */}
{department.head ? `${department.head.firstName[0]}${department.head.lastName[0]}` : '??'}
{department.head ? `${department.head.firstName} ${department.head.lastName}` : 'Unassigned'}
Department Head (Primary)
Chain Status Active
Backup Node None Configured
Node ID
{department.id.split('-')[0]}...
Created
{new Date(department.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Employee List */}
); }
